rendogclient.midnightconfig.title: RendogClient Settings
rendogclient.midnightconfig.cooldownEnab: Enables the Cooldown GUI. (Even if disabled, cooldown calculations will still occur internally.)
rendogclient.midnightconfig.cooldownGUIX: The X position of the Cooldown GUI.
rendogclient.midnightconfig.cooldownGUIY: The Y position of the Cooldown GUI.
rendogclient.midnightconfig.cooldownGUIS: The scale factor of the Cooldown GUI.
rendogclient.midnightconfig.cooldownGUIE: Extends the cooldown GUI per line.
rendogclient.midnightconfig.cooldownChat:
The number of milliseconds that the client waits before detecting the next left-click chat info after an item swap.
If the value is too small, it may overwrite another weapon's cooldown.
rendogclient.midnightconfig.cdr.tooltip:
Percentage of cooldown reduction.
Cooldown detected by clicks will be reduced by the given percentage value.
rendogclient.midnightconfig.cooldownGUIR: Skips item rendering, which is useful if the GUI overlaps with the hotbar.
rendogclient.midnightconfig.cooldownGUIL: The color used to display left cooldown.
rendogclient.midnightconfig.cooldownGUIR: The color used to display right cooldown.
rendogclient.midnightconfig.healthGUIX.t: The X position of the Health GUI.
rendogclient.midnightconfig.healthGUIY.t: The Y position of the Health GUI.
rendogclient.midnightconfig.healthGUISca: The scale factor of the Health GUI.
rendogclient.midnightconfig.maxHealth.to:
Maximum health value retrieved from RendogServer.
Use the /hp command to check.
rendogclient.midnightconfig.lowHealthThr: The health threshold below which the client considers the player to have low health.
rendogclient.midnightconfig.healthGUIPre: A prefix text displayed in front of the health value in the GUI.
rendogclient.midnightconfig.healthGUINor: The color used to display health in normal conditions.
rendogclient.midnightconfig.healthGUILow: The color used to display health when it is below the low health threshold.
rendogclient.midnightconfig.healthGUIFul: The color used to display health when it is at maximum.
rendogclient.midnightconfig.godModeInfoG: The X position of the GodModeInfo GUI.
The Y position of the GodModeInfo GUI.
The scale factor of the GodModeInfo GUI.
rendogclient.midnightconfig.godModeInfoT:
The text displayed when GodMode is enabled.
Use '\n' for line-break, '%DURATION%' and '%UNIT%' for information.
rendogclient.midnightconfig.godModeInfoD: The unit used for displaying GodMode's duration.
rendogclient.midnightconfig.playerModelG: The X position of the PlayerModel GUI.
The Y position of the PlayerModel GUI.
The scale factor of the PlayerModel GUI.
rendogclient.midnightconfig.lootPerMinut: Enables the LootPerMinute GUI. (Should enable loot message)
The X position of the LootPerMinute GUI.
The Y position of the LootPerMinute GUI.
The scale factor of the LootPerMinute GUI.
A prefix text displayed in front of the lpm value in the GUI.
The color used to display lpm when it is at 0.
The color that becomes closer as the lpm increases.
Hides loot message. (Rare loot will still be shown)
